document.heading: Highway Trust Fund Establishment Act and the Water and Sewer Authority Amendment Act of 1996

history.narrative: Law 11-184, the “Highway Trust Fund Establishment Act and the Water and Sewer Authority Amendment Act of 1996,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 11-513, which was referred to the Committee on Public Works and the Environment. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 6, 1996, and July 3, 1996, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 22, 1996, it was assigned Act No. 11-337 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 11-184 became effective on April 9, 1997.
